evals.name: generate-from-sitemap
evals.prompt: Create an llms.txt file for geoly.ai. Pull the URLs from their sitemap and generate descriptions for each page.
evals.expected_output: A properly formatted llms.txt file with brand description, overview paragraphs, and organized sections with links and descriptions.

evals.name: validate-existing-file
evals.prompt: Validate this llms.txt file for me and tell me if it follows best practices: [user provides file content]
evals.expected_output: Validation report with errors, warnings, and suggestions for improvement.

evals.name: interactive-generation
evals.prompt: I need help creating an llms.txt for my startup. Can you walk me through it interactively?
evals.expected_output: Interactive prompts for brand info, URLs, and descriptions, followed by a complete llms.txt file.

evals.name: optimize-existing
evals.prompt: Here's our current llms.txt. Can you optimize it for better AI crawler accessibility?
evals.expected_output: Review of current file with specific improvements and optimized version.
